title: Behind the Red Doors: Heaven Scent\Diamond Mine\Sheer Delights
description: An entertaining trio of sensual tales, centering around the romantic escapades that occur in a lingerie shop called The Red Door, includes Vicki Lewis Thompson's Door #1, in which Jamie Ruskin uses the powers of aromatherapy to seduce the man of her dreams, Dev Sherman. Original.
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
